name: The Garden Society: Kykuit [2009]
description:
Having left his past behind, Arthur finds himself in the company of new, kind people. Will he find peace, make friends... or more?

A visual novel with multiple endings. This is a remake of the original "The Garden Society: Kykuit" by Ren'Ai Games (2005)

  • writer & character artist: Rio
  • BGs: May (original), John Q. Hong, shurraycmu, Tim Smith
  • music: Jesta Ariadne
  • producer & director: mikey
